about.title: About me
about.p1: I'm a Cybersecurity Professional, Full Stack Software Developer, and Attorney based in Ecuador. I combine my Juris Doctor with hands-on technical skills in React, TypeScript, and security compliance. Currently building secure enterprise applications at Kriptos and developing Markatzy, an AI-powered trademark protection platform.
about.p2: My unique cross-disciplinary background spans law, software engineering, and financial analysis. I've contributed to SOC 2 Type II certifications, delivered 37,000+ lines of production code, and hold credentials from UT Austin, BrainStation (Konrad Group), Harvard Business School Online, and AWS (Certified Cloud Practitioner).

markatzy.title: Markatzy
markatzy.description: AI-powered trademark monitoring and conflict detection platform. Analyzes conflicts across four dimensions: semantic, typographic, phonetic, and visual. Currently in beta with leading IP law firms in Ecuador. Built with React, Next.js, TypeScript, and vector databases.

updateManager.title: Update Manager
updateManager.description: Windows agent installation orchestrator built for Kriptos Inc. Enables IT departments to securely deploy and manage software across thousands of client computers at banks and multinationals. Led frontend development with 219 commits and 37,000+ lines of code.

graceNelson.title: Grace Nelson Law
graceNelson.description: Complete website and digital infrastructure for a bilingual expat-focused law firm with 22+ years of experience.
